MPIEvalEnv module¶

class MPIEvalEnv.MPIEvalEnv¶

Bases: shiva.envs.Environment.Environment

launch() → None¶

Launches environments, creates buffers, tells MPIEvaluation it started.

Returns

None

run() → None¶

Starts environments and collects trajectories.

Returns

None

create_buffers() → None¶

Creates numpy buffers to store episodic rewards

Returns

None

reset_buffers() → None¶

Empties the buffers after finishing a trajectory.

Returns

None

close() → None¶

Closes the connection with MPIEvaluation

Returns

None

log(msg, to_print=False, verbose_level=- 1) → None¶

If verbose_level is not given, by default will log :param msg: Message to be loged :param to_print: Whether to print it :param verbose_level: When to print it

Returns

None

show_comms() → None¶

Shows what MPIEvaluation this EvalEnv is connection to. :returns: None
